net.corda.testing.dsl

Interface TransactionDSLInterpreter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    OutputStateLookup, Verifies
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TestTransactionDSLInterpreter, TransactionDSL

    public TransactionDSLInterpreter
extends Verifies, OutputStateLookup

    This interface defines the bare bone functionality that a Transaction DSL interpreter should implement.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface net.corda.testing.dsl.Verifies

        Verifies.DefaultImpls

      • input

        void input(StateRef stateRef)

        Adds an input reference to the transaction. Note that Verifies.verifies will resolve this reference.

        Parameters:
        stateRef - The input class StateRef.
        See Also:
        Verifies.verifies

      • reference

        void reference(StateRef stateRef)

        Add a reference input state to the transaction. Note that Verifies.verifies will resolve this reference.

        Parameters:
        stateRef - The input class StateRef.
        See Also:
        Verifies.verifies

      • output

        void output(java.lang.String contractClassName,
            java.lang.String label,
            Party notary,
            java.lang.Integer encumbrance,
            AttachmentConstraint attachmentConstraint,
            ContractState contractState)

        Adds an output to the transaction.

        Parameters:
        label - An optional label that may be later used to retrieve the output probably in other transactions.
        notary - The associated notary.
        encumbrance - The position of the encumbrance state.
        attachmentConstraint - The attachment constraint
        contractState - The state itself.
        contractClassName - The class name of the contract that verifies this state.

      • attachment

        void attachment(SecureHash attachmentId)

        Adds an interface Attachment reference to the transaction.

        Parameters:
        attachmentId - The hash of the attachment, possibly returned by LedgerDSLInterpreter.attachment.
        See Also:
        interface Attachment

      • command

        void command(java.util.List<? extends java.security.PublicKey> signers,
             CommandData commandData)

        Adds a command to the transaction.

        Parameters:
        signers - The signer public keys.
        commandData - The contents of the command.

      • timeWindow

        void timeWindow(TimeWindow data)

        Sets the time-window of the transaction.

        Parameters:
        data - the class TimeWindow (validation window).

      • _tweak

        Creates a local scoped copy of the transaction.

        Parameters:
        dsl - The transaction DSL to be interpreted using the copy.
